description:
This hamper is supplied by The Gourmet Pantry (Liquor Licence #36160581)
Packed in a quality, exclusively designed French Blue hamper box with a folding magnetic lid and stylish gold bow. Delivered by Express Post Australia wide in an insulated shipper with a free personalised gift card.

This selection of gourmet treats paired with a fine bottle of The Glenlivet Founders Reserve Single Malt Whisky makes the perfect present for a Whisky Lover.

This luxury gourmet hamper includes:
The Glenlivit Founder's Reserve Whisky 700ml
VPC Mini Artisan Crackers - Sea Salt 110g
TCE Milk Chocolate Roasted Almonds 180g
TRCC Honey Popcorn 80g
VPC Luxury Nuts Herb & Spice Blend 120g
Kangaroo Island Olives - Smoked Kalamata 80g
TCE Caramelised Cashew Brittle 140g
Ernest Hillier Fruit & Nut 240g
VPC Flatbread Crackers- Cheese 130g
Packed in Australia with Australian & imported products.
This hamper includes a FREE custom gift card! You can customise this card upon checkout, and it will be included with your hamper gift.
Products in this hamper may contain traces of peanuts, treenuts, soy and gluten.
Very infrequently, we may be out of stock of an individual component in this hamper. Not to worry, though! We will always substitute a missing product for one of equal or higher value. In most cases, we'll even keep the category of product the same. In the unlikely event that it happens, any substitution of products within a hamper will most-likely be just a different flavour or variety of the same product.
name: The Gourmet Pantry 1EA
